scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "yarn --cwd backend dev" "yarn --cwd admin start" "yarn --cwd extension dev" "yarn --cwd extension-app start"
scripts.test: yarn --cwd backend test && yarn --cwd admin test && yarn --cwd extension test && yarn --cwd extension-app test
